name: Half-True
description:
Half-True is an interactive experience whose goal is to raise awareness about food sustainability. It focuses on the consequences of animal farming, one of the major culprits of our environmental ills. By interacting with this virtual diorama, users will see what the meat and dairy industry are doing to the planet. What’s at stake in our eating choices is not only our own and our children’s health, but the health of the environment that sustains life on Earth.

Hi everyone! 

I would like to ask for your suggestion and feedback about my game. I'm partnering with Video Games Without Borders, an organization that celebrates serious games as a form of artistic expression and we are trying to find an NGO that could be interested in collaborating and promoting this game. 

So if you have any recommendation please feel free to contact me anytime, thanks!
